channel.title: My508 Compiler HELP!
channel.description:
Hey Guys i made a post before asking why my compiler for my 508 server wasnt working proplerly and someone helped me and its a little bit better now but still wont compile im wondering if anyone could maybe solve my problem if so its much appreciated this is what i have in my compiler:
@echo off Title G scape compiler cd .. "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ./Bin/ ./Bulby/./io/*.java pause
But when i compile it is does this:
.\Bulby\io\packets\Commands.java:1: class, interface, or enum expected if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("adminzone") && playerRights > 1) { ^ .\Bulby\io\packets\Commands.java:3: class, interface, or enum expected teleportToY = 5532; ^ .\Bulby\io\packets\Commands.java:4: class, interface, or enum expected }/* ^ .\Bulby\.\io\PacketManager.java:41: cannot access Bulby.io.packets.Commands bad class file: .\Bulby\io\packets\Commands.java file does not contain class Bulby.io.packets.Commands Please remove or make sure it appears in the correct subdirectory of the classpa th. public Commands command = new Commands(); ^ Press any key to continue . . .
If anyone could help its very much needed im new at coding and im trying to code my own server=P
Thanx guys

item.title: My508 Compiler HELP!
item.dc:creator: @G_scape G scape
item.description:
@G_scape wrote:

So what ive edited is wrong then sorry this is all like wierd for me im new at coding…

Read full topic

item.title: My508 Compiler HELP!
item.dc:creator: @_Rune_Realm ~Rune Realm
item.description:
@_Rune_Realm wrote:

Your compiler is fine. It’s just that your class Commands is a bad class file (It wasn’t declared as a class).

Read full topic

item.title: My508 Compiler HELP!
item.dc:creator: @G_scape G scape
item.description:
@G_scape wrote:

Ok can you edit what i have here to show me what to put in my compiler?

Read full topic

item.title: My508 Compiler HELP!
item.dc:creator: @_Rune_Realm ~Rune Realm
item.description:
@_Rune_Realm wrote:

Above the first line of class Commands, add:

public class Commands {

'And below the last line add

}

Everything should work now.

Read full topic

item.title: My508 Compiler HELP!
item.dc:creator: @G_scape G scape
item.description:
@G_scape wrote:

Hey Guys i made a post before asking why my compiler for my 508 server wasnt working proplerly and someone helped me and its a little bit better now but still wont compile im wondering if anyone could maybe solve my problem if so its much appreciated this is what i have in my compiler:

@echo off
Title G scape compiler
cd …
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d ./Bin/ ./Bulby/./io/*.java
pause

But when i compile it is does this:

.\Bulby\io\packets\Commands.java:1: class, interface, or enum expected
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“adminzone”) && playerRights > 1) {
^
.\Bulby\io\packets\Commands.java:3: class, interface, or enum expected
teleportToY = 5532;
^
.\Bulby\io\packets\Commands.java:4: class, interface, or enum expected
}/*
^
.\Bulby.\io\PacketManager.java:41: cannot access Bulby.io.packets.Commands
bad class file: .\Bulby\io\packets\Commands.java
file does not contain class Bulby.io.packets.Commands
Please remove or make sure it appears in the correct subdirectory of the classpa
th.
public Commands command = new Commands();
^
Press any key to continue . . .

If anyone could help its very much needed im new at coding and im trying to code my own server=P

Thanx guys

Read full topic
